extra.invalid_session: [{0}] {1} SESSION ID WRONG AANU, VEENDUM SCAN CHEYYU!!!
extra.group_cmd: Ee command groups-il mathrame work aavu.
extra.lang_not_supported: ' {0} ' ee bhasha ippo pattiilla, default-ilekk maarunnu.
extra.yt_auth_required:
Download fail aayi: YouTube-nu authentication venam.

*Solutions:*
1. *Google Auth (Recommended):* Ninte Google account link cheyyaan `.gauth auth` use cheyyu.
2. *YT_COOKIE:* `YT_COOKIE` environment variable set cheyyuka.
Wiki: https://github.com/lyfe00011/levanter/wiki/yt%E2%80%90cookie

*Error:* {0}

common.update: _Settings ellaam update aayi! Ellaam save cheythittund._

afk.example:
> *AFK engine upayogikkuka:*
- AFK On aakkan: *afk [kaaranam]*
- Udaharanam: *afk Njan busy-aanu* Last seen #lastseen
- Message ayachaal AFK thaniye off aavum
- AFK Off aakkan: *afk off*

antifake.example:
*Antifake Status:* {0}

> *Command Upayogikkuka:*
- *antifake list* - Ippozhathe mode-um code-um kaanaan
- *antifake allow 1,91* - Whitelist Mode: Ee codes allow cheyyuka, baakki ellaam block aavum
- *antifake disallow 92,93* - Blacklist Mode: Ee codes block cheyyuka, baakki ellaam allow aavum
- *antifake remove 91* - List-il ninnu code maatraan
- *antifake clear* - Ellaam maatri off aakkaan
- *antifake on | off* - On/Off aakkaan

> *Sradhikkuka:* Whitelist-um Blacklist-um kootti kalarutha. Mode maattaan `clear` use cheyyu.
antifake.allow_prompt:
*Allow cheyyaanulla country codes parayu (whitelist mode)*
_Example: antifake allow 1,91_
antifake.disallow_prompt:
*Block cheyyaanulla country codes parayu (blacklist mode)*
_Example: antifake disallow 92,93_
antifake.mode_conflict_whitelist: *âš ï¸ Rendum kootti kalarutha!*\n\n_Nee ippo Blacklist Mode-ilaanu. Whitelist-ilekk maaraan adyam `antifake clear` use cheyyu._
antifake.mode_conflict_blacklist: *âš ï¸ Rendum kootti kalarutha!*\n\n_Nee ippo Whitelist Mode-ilaanu. Blacklist-ilekk maaraan adyam `antifake clear` use cheyyu._
antifake.cleared: *ğŸ—‘ï¸ Antifake list ellaam poyi, off aayi*

antilink.antilink_notset: Ellaa links-um block aakkan aanu paranjittullath (URL list illa). URL set cheyyaan 'antilink allow' athallengil 'antilink disallow' use cheyyu.
antilink.example:
Antilink Status: *{0}*

> Udaharanangal:
- antilink list - Ayalvattathe settings kaanaan
- antilink allow whatsapp.com - Ee URL allow cheyyaan
- antilink disallow facebook.com - Ee URL block cheyyaan
- antilink clear allow - Allowed URLs ellaam kaaliyaakaan
- antilink clear disallow - Disallowed URLs ellaam kaaliyaakaan
- antilink on | off - Antilink On/Off aakkaan
- antilink kick | warn | null - Link vannaal enthu cheyyanam ennathu set cheyyaan
antilink.no_new_urls: *Puthuthaayi onnum ezhuthaanilla.* Ellaam ippo thanne list-ilaanu.
antilink.urls_updated:
*Allowed URLs update aayitto*

Added: {0}
Total: {1} URL(s)

_Note: Case-sensitive alla_
antilink.no_disallowed_urls: *Puthuthaayi onnum block aakkanilla.* Ellaam ippo thanne block-ilaanu.
antilink.disallowed_updated:
*Blocklist update aayitto*

Added to blocklist: {0}
Total blocked: {1} URL(s)

_Note: Case-sensitive alla_

antiword.example:
AntiWord Status: {0}
> *Usage Examples:*
- antiword kick | warn | null - Set action for violations
- antiword on | off - Enable/Disable word filtering
- antiword add word1,word2 - Add words to block list
- antiword remove word1,word2 - Remove words from block list
- antiword list - View blocked words

greetings.welcome_desc: New members varumbom welcome message ayaykkan
greetings.welcome_example:
Welcome ippo *{0}* aanu

> *Usage Examples:*
- welcome Hi &mention! &name-lekk swagatham - Welcome message set cheyyaan
- welcome on | off - On/Off aakkaan
- welcome delete - Message delete cheyyaan

> *Placeholders:*
- &mention - New member-e mention cheyyaan
- &name - Group name
- &desc - Group description
- &size - Members count
- &pp - Member-ude profile picture

> *Media:* Photo/Video reply cheyyu OR link kodukku

Kooduthal details-inu: https://levanter.site/

Ennitt use cheyyu: welcome on

common_members.desc: Rendu groups-il ulla common members-e kaanaan athallengil purathaakkaan
common_members.common_usage:
*Example*
common jid
common jid kick
common jid1 jid2
common jid1,jid2 kick
common jid1 jid2 jid3...jid999

common jid1 jid2 jid3 any
kick - nee command ayacha group-il ninnu maathram maattaan
kickall - ellaa jid-il ninnu maattaan
any - randu athillengil kooduthal groups-il ulla common members-e kuttan
skip - purathaakkaan thalparyam illaathavarude JID skip cheyyaan, example skip oru group-ine maattaan athallennkil skip jid1,jid2 common members purathaakkaan pattiILLAthavanu.

insta.desc: Instagram posts, reels, video download cheyyaan.

ison.desc: Oru number WhatsApp-il undo ennu check cheyyaan.

rmbg.key: Ee command upayogikkan remove.bg-il sign up cheyyuka, account verify cheyyuka, API key copy cheyyuka, pinne .setvar RMBG_KEY:<ninte_api_key> (e.g., .setvar RMBG_KEY:GWQ6jVy9MBpfYF9SnyG8jz8P) set cheyyuka. SIGNUP: https://accounts.kaleido.ai/users/sign_up | API KEY: https://www.remove.bg/dashboard#api-key
rmbg.error: API key athallennkil photo kittiilla. API key set cheythittu photo-kku reply kodukku.

setschedule.usage:
> *Example :*
- setschedule jid,min-mani-divasam-maasam (24 hour format-il, divasam maasam venel mathram)
- setschedule 91987654321@s.whatsapp.net, 9-9-13-8
- setschedule 91987654321@s.whatsapp.net, 0-10 (ellaa divasavum 10 am-nu ayaykkaan)
- setschedule 91987654321@s.whatsapp.net, 0-10, once (oru thavan mathram 10 am-nu ayaykkaan)
setschedule.desc: Message thaniye ayaykkan schedule cheyyaan. Target JID-um samayavum para (minut-mani-divasam-maasam format; divasavum maasavum venel mathram). Ethe message-aano schedule cheyandath athinu reply kodukku.
setschedule.invalid: Schedule format athallengil time thettaanu. Udaharanangal sradhikkuka.

getschedule.desc: Ee chat-ile ellaa scheduled messages kaanaan.

delschedule.desc: Target JID-um samayanvum paranju schedule maattaan, athallennkil 'all' upayogichu ellaam maattaan.

setstatus.usage: Example: setstatus jid,jid,jid,... ATHALLENGIL setstatus contact
setstatus.desc: WhatsApp status set cheyyaan. Photo, video athallennkil text-inu reply kodukkuka.

scstatus.usage:
Examples:
- scstatus jid,jid,jid,...|min-mani-divasam-maasam
- scstatus contact|min-mani-divasam-maasam
- scstatus delete all|min-mani-divasam-maasam
- scstatus list

antispam.desc: Antispam protection manage cheyyaan levels-um set cheyyaam
antispam.disabled_status:
ğŸ“Š *Antispam Status*

ğŸ”´ Off aanu

`antispam on` use cheyyu on aakkaan
antispam.deactivated:
âš ï¸ *Antispam Protection Off aayitto*

Spam detection ippo OFF aanu
antispam.invalid_level: âŒ Level thettaanu. low, medium, high upayogikkuka
antispam.help:
ğŸ“– *Antispam Sahayam*

*Commands:*
â€¢ `antispam on` - Enable aakkan (default: medium)
â€¢ `antispam off` - Disable aakkan
â€¢ `antispam <low/medium/high>` - Sensitivity maattaan
â€¢ `antispam <warn/delete/kick>` - Action maattaan
â€¢ `antispam info` - Settings kaanaan

*Levels:*
â€¢ Low - Active groups-inu
â€¢ Medium - Balanced (nallath)
â€¢ High - Strict (problem groups-inu)

sticker.desc: Photo-ye athallengil video-ye sticker aakkan. Reply kodukku.

tictactoe.usage:
Example: tictactoe <opponent_jid> ATHALLENGIL tictactoe normal <opponent_jid> ATHALLENGIL tictactoe restart <opponent_jid> ATHALLENGIL tictactoe end
Default infinite mode aanu, normal mode venel 'tictactoe normal' use cheyyu.
tictactoe.desc: TicTacToe game-inu. Challenge cheyyaan mention cheyyukka, reply kodukkuka athallengil JID para. End cheyyaan 'tictactoe end' restart cheyyaan 'tictactoe restart <opponent_jid>' use cheyyu. Default infinite mode aayirikkum, normal mode venel 'tictactoe normal' use cheyyu.
tictactoe.choose_opponent: Reply cheythittulla aale thiranjedukko mention cheyyu. Nee swanthamaayi game kalikkaan pattiilla.

yts.desc: YouTube videos search cheyyaan peru athallennkil URL para.

song.usage: Example: song indila love story ATHALLENGIL song <YouTube URL> (reply-um work aavum)
song.desc: YouTube-il ninnu paattu download cheyyaan. URL koduthaal direct download aavum.

video.usage: Example: video 720p <YouTube URL> ATHALLENGIL video <YouTube URL>
video.desc: YouTube video download cheyyaan. Quality-um venel mathram para (e.g., 720p, 1080p). Default 480p aanu.

update.desc: Puthiya updates undo ennu check cheyyaan.
update.up_to_date: Bot ippo thanne latest version aanu.

antigm.usage:
> Usage:
- antigm on | off â€” Anti group mention set cheyyaan
- antigm delete | warn | kick â€” Action set cheyyaan
- antigm ignore jid,jid,... â€” Chila groups skip cheyyaan
antigm.action: Action update aayi: Group mention vannaal ippo *{0}* aavum.
antigm.filter: Anti group mention skip list update aayitto.

reminder.usage:
*Reminder Command Usage:*

- reminder <text> (event add cheyyaan)
- reminder list (aduthe events kaanaan)
- reminder del <id> (event delete cheyyaan)
- Example: `reminder tomorrow at 10am meeting`
reminder.short_id_info: *Note:* Delete command-u-maayi ID-yude adyam randu moonu aksharam mathram ezhuthiyaal madhi.

gauth.desc: YouTube Age Restriction, Google Drive, Calendar, pinne Tasks settings manage cheyyaan Google Auth upayogikkuka.
gauth.usage:
*Google Auth Commands:*

- `.gauth auth` â€” Auth start cheyyaan.
- `.gauth code <url_or_code>` â€” Auth code/URL validate cheyyaan.
- `.gauth import` â€” `credentials.json` import cheyyaan (file-inu reply kodukkuka).
- `.gauth status` â€” Ippozhathe status check cheyyaan.
- `.gauth logout` â€” Credentials-um tokens-um clear cheyyaan.

*Note:* YouTube-ile normal features-inu Google Auth nirbandhamalla. Pakshe Age-restricted videos, Google Drive/Calendar/Tasks integration ennivaykku ithu venam.
gauth.prompt:
*Google Authentication Setup Guide:*

1. *Project undakku:* https://console.cloud.google.com/-il poyittu "Select a project" > "New Project" klikku cheyyu, peru "Levanter" ennidu pinne "Create" kuttu.
2. *Enable APIs:* "APIs & Services" > "Library"-il poyi "Google Drive API", "Google Calendar API" pinne "Google Tasks API" enniva search cheythittu enable cheyyu.
3. *OAuth Consent:* "APIs & Services" > "OAuth consent screen"-il poyi "External" thiranjedukku. Ella details-um filla cheyyu, pinne "Audience"-il ninte email-u-maayaa "Test users"-il add cheyyu (MANDATORY).
4. *Credentials:* "APIs & Services" > "Credentials"-il poyi "Create Credentials" > "OAuth client ID" klikku cheyyu. "Desktop app" thiranjedukku, peru idu, "Create" kuttu.
5. *Download:* Client ID-yude thottu aduthe Download (JSON) icon klikku cheyyu. Athu save cheythittu `.gauth import` upayogichu aa file-inu reply kodukku.
6. *Authorize:* Ennitt ee link klikku cheyyu:
{0}

7. *Theerthu:* Login cheyyu, "Unverified app" warning vannaal "Advanced" > "Go to Levanter" klikku cheyyu. Redirect aaya shesham full URL address bar-il ninnu copy cheythittu ayaykkuka:
`.gauth code <copied_url>`

gdrive.url_prompt:
Sariyaya URL athallengil media message para athallennkil: list, del <id>, dl <id> use cheyyu.
Example: `gupload list`
gdrive.short_id_info: *Note:* Download athallennkil delete command-u-maayi ID-yude adyam randu moonu aksharam mathram ezhuthiyaal madhi.

task.usage: Usage: task <list | lists | switch <peru> | add <text> | del <id> | done <id> | update <id> <text> | <text>>
task.auth_required: Adyam *.gauth auth* use cheythittu Google Tasks permissions kuttu.
